info.title: Microsoft Translator V3
info.description: Microsoft Translator lets you translate text across multiple languages.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request. Check input parameters.

403.description: The request isn't authorized. Check the details error message. This status code often indicates that all free translations provided with a trial subscription have been used up.

408.description: The request couldn't be fulfilled because a resource is missing.

429.description: The server rejected the request because the client has exceeded request limits.

503.description: Service is currently unavailable. Try again later.

post.description: Translates text to a specified language using Microsoft Translator.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type like application/json.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API requested by the client. Value must be 3.0.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The source language (if not provided, Microsoft Translator will try to auto-detect) (example: en).

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The target language code (example: 'fr').

parameters.name: textType
parameters.description: Defines whether the text being translated is plain text or HTML text.

parameters.name: profanityAction
parameters.description: Specifies how profanities should be treated in translations.

parameters.name: profanityMarker
parameters.description: Specifies how profanities should be marked in translations.

parameters.name: includeSentenceLength
parameters.description: Specifies whether to include sentence boundaries for the input text and the translated text.

parameters.name: suggestedFrom
parameters.description: Specifies a fallback language if the language of the input text can't be identified.

parameters.name: fromScript
parameters.description: The name of the fromScript within the specified language.

parameters.name: toScript
parameters.description: The name of the toScript within the specified language.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The translation category (default: 'general').

parameters.name: allowFallback
parameters.description: Specifies that the service is allowed to fall back to a general system when a custom system doesn't exist.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request. Check input parameters.

403.description: The request is not authorized. Check the details error message. This often indicates that all free translations provided with a trial subscription have been used up.

503.description: Service is currently unavailable. Try again later.

post.description: Converts text in one language from one script to another script.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type like application/json.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API requested by the client. Value must be 3.0.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Specifies the language of the text to convert from one script to another.

parameters.name: fromScript
parameters.description: The name of the fromScript within the specified language.

parameters.name: toScript
parameters.description: The name of the toScript within the specified language.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request. Check input parameters.

503.description: Service is currently unavailable. Try again later.

post.description: This action starts a document translation job.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type like application/json.

delete.description: Cancels a document translation that is currently processing or queued.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The operation ID.

get.description: Gets a summary of the status for a specific document translation request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The operation ID.

@nextLink.description: Url for the next page. Null if no more pages available.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request. Check input parameters.

get.description: Gets a list of all translation requests submitted by a user and their status.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The total number of records the user wants to be returned across all pages.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the list based on the sorting method.

parameters.name: $maxpagesize
parameters.description: The maximum items returned in a page.

parameters.name: $orderBy
parameters.description: The sorting query for the collection.

parameters.name: createdDateTimeUtcStart
parameters.description: The start datetime to get items after.

parameters.name: createdDateTimeUtcEnd
parameters.description: The end datetime to get items before.

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Statuses to use in filtering.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: IDs to use in filtering.

get.description: Gets the status for a specific document in a job.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The operation ID.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The document ID.

get.description: Gets a list of supported document formats.
Gets a list of supported glossary formats.
Gets a list of supported storage sources/options.

path.description: Location of the document or folder.

lastActionDateTimeUtc.description: Date time in which the operation's status has been updated.

status.description: List of possible statuses for job or document.

progress.description: Progress of the translation if available.

@nextLink.description: Url for the next page. Null if no more pages available.

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The total number of records the user wants to be returned across all pages.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the list based on the sorting method.

parameters.name: $maxpagesize
parameters.description: The maximum items returned in a page.

parameters.name: $orderBy
parameters.description: The sorting query for the collection.

parameters.name: createdDateTimeUtcStart
parameters.description: The start datetime to get items after.

parameters.name: createdDateTimeUtcEnd
parameters.description: The end datetime to get items before.

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Statuses to use in filtering.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: IDs to use in filtering.

get.description: Retrieves all languages that Microsoft Translator supports.
Retrieves all languages that Microsoft Transliterate supports.
Retrieves all languages that Microsoft Translator supports.
Retrieves all supported glossary formats and versions.
Retrieves the list of from scripts for transliteration scope.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The name of the Language for which fromScript has to be fetched.

get.description: Retrieves the list of to scripts for transliteration scope.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The name of the Language for which toScript has to be fetched.

parameters.name: fromScript
parameters.description: The name of the fromScript for which toScript has to be fetched.

get.summary: List all transliteration toscripts for a given language
get.description: Retrieves the list of all toscripts for transliteration scope for a given language.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The name of the Language for which toScript has to be fetched.

Language.description: Language Model for Microsoft Translator translatable languages.

Code.description: Gets or sets the language code.

Name.description: Gets or sets the language name.

GlossaryFormatVersion.description: Glossary Format and version for document translation.

FormatVersionCode.description: Gets or sets the file format and version code.

FormatVersionName.description: Gets or sets the file format and version name.

storageType.description: Storage type can be File or Folder.

sourceLanguage.description: Language code. If none is specified, we'll perform auto detect on the document.

sourceURL.description: URL of the Azure blob container with your documents or URL of a single file.

documentFilterPrefix.description: A case-sensitive prefix string to filter documents in the source path for translation. For example, when using an Azure storage blob Uri, use the prefix to restrict sub folders for translation.

documentFilterSuffix.description: A case-sensitive suffix string to filter documents in the source path for translation. It's most often use for file extensions.

targetCategory.description: Category or custom system for translation request.

targetContainerURL.description: The target container URL where the translated files will be stored.

glossaryUrl.description: Location of the glossary. We'll use the file extension to extract the formatting if the format parameter isn't supplied. If the translation language pair isn't present in the glossary, it won't be applied.

target.description: Gets the source of the error. For example, it would be documents or document ID in the case of an invalid document.
Gets the source of the error. For example, it would be documents or document id if there was an invalid document.

innerError.description: New Inner Error format that conforms to Cognitive Services API Guidelines. This contains required properties ErrorCode, message, and optional properties target, details (key value pair), inner error (this can be nested).

target.description: Gets the source of the error. For example, it would be documents or document id if there was an invalid document.

innerError.description: New Inner Error format that conforms to Cognitive Services API Guidelines. This contains required properties ErrorCode, message, and optional properties target, details (key value pair), inner error (this can be nested).

fileExtensions.description: Supported file extension for this format.

defaultVersion.description: Default version if none is specified.

lastActionDateTimeUtc.description: Date time in which the operation's status has been updated.

status.description: List of possible statuses for job or document like Canceled, Cancelling, Failed, NotStarted, Running, Succeeded, ValidationFailed.

notYetStarted.description: Count of documents not yet started processing.

path.description: Location of the document or folder.

lastActionDateTimeUtc.description: Date time in which the operation's status has been updated.

status.description: List of possible statuses for job or document like Canceled, Cancelling, Failed, NotStarted, Running, Succeeded, ValidationFailed.

progress.description: Progress of the translation if available.
